ygData.subject: Just wanted to say Hi!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey everybody! Joined the club a while ago and figured I should finally post something. I have a 21 level Ogre Shaman on Seventh Hammer. Wondered if anyone
ygData.messageBody:
Hey everybody! Joined the club a while ago and
figured I should finally post something. I have a 21
level Ogre Shaman on Seventh Hammer. Wondered if anyone
else here was on the same server, if so drop me a line
sometime. My character's name is Gromesh. I just figured
out that I should have gotten the shrink spell at
level 19. Maybe I just looked over it in my shammy
guild. If I'm wrong could somebody point me in the right
direction? Mostly just wanted to say Hi to everybody. Happy
hunting!
